name: Jamal Khidir

projects.title: Exploratory Analysis of 911 Calls
projects.description: This project focuses on analyzing 911 call data from the Philadelphia to uncover patterns and insights. The dataset, sourced from Kaggle, includes fields such as latitude, longitude, emergency description, and timestamps.

projects.title: Delivery Routing System Algorithm
projects.description: This project focuses on using the Nearest Neighbor algorithm to create a package delivery system. The project is built using Python and utilizes CSV data for delivery addresses and their distances.

projects.title: Full Stack Hotel Booking Application
projects.description: This link take you to a GitHub repository that contains code for a full stack hotel application. The project was built using an Angular frontend and Spring Boot backend.

projects.title: Predictive Housing Model Proposal
projects.description: This project is an 11-page machine learning proposal that highlights the use of Linear Regression in order to predict a home value based on a set of predictor features.

projects.title: Data Analysis Misc. Projects
projects.description: This project will take you to a GitHub folder that contains data analysis projects using technologies such as SQL, Excel, PowerBI, and Python.

aboutpara: Hello, I'm Jamal! I'm a recent graduate with a BS in Computer Science and a great interest in data science, analytics, and engineering. My professional ambition is to work on hands-on data projects, applying my professional and academic knowledge to practical challenges. I am also gearing up to start an online Master's program in Computer Science, aiming to expand my knowledge in the field and contribute significantly to future workplaces. Outside of my tech-centric world, I find relaxation in reading, golf, basketball, and doing outdoor activities. Recently, I've also taken up chess; although I'm not good (yet), I'm thoroughly enjoying the learning process. These activities not only provide relaxation and pleasure but are pivotal in my ongoing journey of learning and self-improvement.

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹ I'm a recent Computer Science graduate eager to leverage my skills to make data-driven insights

experiences.bullets: Achieved a 20% reduction in redundant applications and contributing to cost efficiency and system simplicity, Developed and maintained accurate data models for the university's application portfolio, Systematically collected and organized data relating to various software applications, Collaborated with a broad range of stakeholders to accurately identify and assess application requirements and needs

education.universityPara: Relevant Coursework: Data Structures and Algorithms, Operating Systems, Computer Architecture, Web Development, Introduction to AI, Advanced Data Management, Network and Security
